Teaching

  • Tutor & marker for Probabilistic Modelling and Reasoning (2019–2020), University of Edinburgh.
  • Marker for Machine Learning Practical (2019–2021), Introductory Applied Machine Learning (2019–2021), and Data Mining & Exploration (2020–2021), University of Edinburgh.
  • Teaching assistant for Knowledge Graph Analysis (WS17/18, WS18/19), University of Bonn, delivering tutorial, course content preparation, exercise and exam assessment.

Reviewer & Program Committees

  • NeurIPS 2025, ICML 2025 (Outstanding Reviewer), NeurIPS 2024 (Top Reviewer), ICML 2024 (Best Reviewer), NeurIPS 2023 (Top Reviewer), ICML 2023.
  • AISTATS 2022–2023 (Top Reviewer), NeurIPS 2022 (Top Reviewer), ICLR 2022 (Highlighted Reviewer).
  • Workshop program committees: TS4Health @ NeurIPS 2025, ML4LMS @ ICML 2024, SynS & ML @ ICML 2023, ML4PS @ NeurIPS 2021/2022/2023.
